value.title: Use DAX iterator functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, youâ€™ll learn about what the family of iterator functions can do and how to use them in your DAX calculations. Calculations will include custom summarizations, ranking, and concatenation.

value.title: Perform fit gap analysis
value.excerpt: Learn about performing a fit gap analysis as a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Microsoft Power Platform.

value.title: Work with Power BI visuals
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose from the exceptional visuals that Power BI makes available to you. Formatting visuals will direct the userâ€™s attention to exactly where you want it, while helping to make the visual easier to read and interpret. You will also learn about how to use key performance indicators (KPIs).
